title: How to ensure human readable prometheus job instance names in Grafana dashboard
description: Kolla-natively, Prometheus does not scrape endpoints by FQDN, as it does not integrate the infrastructure into hostname files. This leads to Grafana only showing nodes by IP, which can be confusing and unintuitive. A better alternative would be clean FQDN names for the Grafana Dashboards provided by prometheus scrape jobs.
